Contradict fact: The claim that Taco Bell is closing all of their locations contradicts the fact that it is a hoax generated by a prank website.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a fake news story created by a prank website.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the information from the hoax news story is true, which is a problematic assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim is a result of a prank by Feednewz.com to troll social media users.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the situation by stating that all Taco Bell locations are closing, when in fact it is a hoax.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim does not necessarily falter at times, as it is consistently false due to its origin as a prank.
